*Java*

Download and unpack the [http://download.forge.objectweb.org/asm/asm-3.2-bin.zip ASM instrumentation framework]

Check out Dimmunix Java agent
{{{
svn checkout http://dimmunix.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/DimmunixInstrumentation
}}}

Check out Dimmunix source code and Dimmunix tests
{{{
svn checkout http://dimmunix.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/DimmunixASM
svn checkout http://dimmunix.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/DimmunixASMTests
}}}

Compile Dimmunix source code and tests
{{{
cd DimmunixASM
ant
cd ../DimmunixASMTests
ant
}}}

*C/C++*

Checkout Dimmunix source code by running:
{{{
svn co http://dimmunix.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/DimmunixLDPreloadEfficient
}}}

Compile Dimmunix by running
{{{
cd DimmunixLDPreloadEfficient
scons
}}}
This will create libdimmunix.so shared library (in folder DimmunixLDPreloadEfficient), that can be linked through LD_PRELOAD to any C/C++ application.
